channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Paving slab on top step is loose and causing a real trip hazard, 21st October
item.description:
This step has been loose for a long time. Previously reported a couple of months ago but has not been fixed. I work in the office and see countless people stumble on it each day. Looking from the shops it is the top left paving slab on the steps
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 26, Marion Crescent, Poverest, Orpington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken Water fountain, 21st October
item.description:
The water fountain at Mint Street park does not work correctly. The flow of water is so low that it's impossible to drink from the water fountain and it's not possible to fill a water bottle.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned vehicle on the access road behind Lapworth Court, 21st October
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chichester Road, Maida Vale, London

item.category: Fly-tip Medium - Up to medium size van load

item.title: Takeaway litter, street sweepers negligent, 21st October
item.description:
Where are the street sweepers? I'm seeing the same takeaway litter blowing about in the wind for days now. This stretch of road is opposite a junction so the wind gathers a lot of rubbish here on the pavement, kerb, inside properties and the substation
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tottenham Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbish dumped outside Nursery School, 21st October
item.description:
Rubbish dumped outside Nursery School. Can possibly cause a rodent problem. Located in Tower Mill Road, one pile of rubbish is outside the school kitchen, one pile is directly opposite the school kitchen.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Newent Close, Old Kent Road, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car, 21st October
item.description:
Red VW outside No 54 Kenthouse Lane seems to be abandoned as it's been parked up for a few weeks. It's parked badly, slightly over my drive, so going out and parking are more hazardous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kent House Lane, New Beckenham, London
Report on FixMyStreet
